title: AI-Based Chat Tool Utilization in Science Education Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Science field job-linked training for current professionals. Emphasis is placed on AI tool utilization in a smartphone-centered, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their understanding of scientific concepts by 20% using AI-based chat tools.
Learners experience productivity improvements by utilizing AI tools at least three times during weekly assignments.

Learners will collaborate with three peers to analyze three AI-generated text/image contents and write a critical evaluation report including improvement points in at least two of the given criteria (accuracy, creativity, ethicality).

Within two weeks, learners will design three AI application strategies (e.g., automated document summarization, data analysis automation, repetitive task scripting) for personal work efficiency using Google Colab and Hugging Face in an environment with ≤4 CPU cores and ≤8GB RAM, apply them to actual tasks for one week, and demonstrate a time-saving effect of ≥20% through measurable metrics (e.g., task completion time comparison).

resources: Mobile-Optimized AI Chat Platform (e.g., ChatGPT Lite)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
